segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is about to tip over while reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to fall if he leans any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable—why is he even standing on it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar is almost empty, and they’re still taking more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother knows they’re doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at them to be careful, but they’re too focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to get in trouble too, even though she’s not climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t break anything if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
